predicate.note: Frames file for 'empty' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 45.4 and 10.3, Framenet entries Emptying and Removing.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: ``The guys are going for their skis, their stereos, their personal computers,'' said Frank Fitzgerald, who helped others empty their apartments.

example.name: container and substance
example.text: The parties are currently negotiating over who would manage the building, which [*T*-3] will be emptied [*-1] of 6,000 employees from Sears' merchandise group, which is moving elsewhere.
example.arg: 6,000 employees from Sears' merchandise group, which is moving elsewhere
